Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage
India are looking the favorites as they cruised into the semi-finals, winning all the six matches they played so far
England were beaten by Australia as they barely managed to squeeze into the Super 8s stage on the net run rate
Miscellaneous Highlights: India have struggled in the big knockout games in ICC events in the last decade
India have choked in big games including the 2014 T20 World Cup final against Sri Lanka and the 2016 T20 World Cup semi-finals against the West Indies
India have succumbed under the pressure of knockout games, losing to Australia and New Zealand in the semi-finals of the 2015 and 2019 World Cups respectively
Others: Jasprit Bumrah (11 wickets) and Arshdeep Singh (15 wickets) will need to once again make early inroads against a powerful England batting line-up
Buttler has slammed 191 in seven matches in this T20 World Cup at a strike rate of 159, while Salt has hit 183 runs at a strike rate of 166
England's most dangerous batter in the death overs is Liam Livingstone, who boasts of a strike rate of 151 in T20 Internationals
